name: Land of music
description:
Made for the Pizza Jam. The horse name I used was "Land Of Song".

Build a land of music! Each building you place down makes a unique sound. Combine them to create a sick beat.

Controls:
WASD or arrow keys to move the camera
Click on the house icon to buy new buildings
Click on a building to adjust its delay and volume
Click on the chest icon to see your resources

Also, if you download the Linux or Mac versions and they work, please tell me in the comments. I'm not able to test them.
